title: What are the solutions to scene/prefab conflict merging?

sections.title: Symptoms
content:
• There is a loss of information when trying to merge scenes and prefabs into a version control system.
  • I receive a notification that there is a merge conflict.

sections.title: Cause
content: This can occur if you are working in a project with several people and two or more persons are modifying the same scene/prefab.

sections.title: Resolution
content: In Unity 5, a smart merge tool was added called YAML merge tool.  Please review the documentation for information and guidance.
